entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, sdk #sdk-110982-.NET5SDK5.0.2xx #21399
  • `dotnet watch run` throws AFTER CTRL-C #21397
  • `dotnet tool install -a arm64` fails #21395
    6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet run -a` doesn't work well from x64 #21393
    6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet tool install -a` works great #21392
  • `dotnet test --arch x64` fails #21391
  • [Breaking change] Consider giving `-a` to `--arch` instead of `--test-adapter-path` #21389
  • [6.0.100-rc.2.21472.34] nuke global tool app fails to restore #21362
  • Please add `--source` to dotnet tool install #21355
  • dotnet-serve tool does not work on macOS Arm64 #21349
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #sdk-110573-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #21343

Closed

  • dotnet workload install takes an incredible amount of time after updating the sdk #21319

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up client/server shutdown #21390
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1384972 #21388
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1384832 #21387
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Bash shebang for scripts to run under FreeBSD #21361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix failure when manifest that is expected to exist isn't found #21358
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
    Area-Install, Area-Workloads
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.2xx #20863
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix workload nuget retry issue #21329
    Area-Workloads
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21310
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create UpdateToNewTargetFramework.md #21103
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385519 #21400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
